sentences: Ta esindab äsja kohtus olnud meest.
Äsja tehtud uuring leiab, et see on tõesti nii.
Äsja võetud pildid on juba internetis.
context: The word äsja is used in Estonian to refer to a thing, matter, or affair, and it is commonly used in sentences to describe something that has happened or been done recently.
